text.text_translated: Generally, more people are learning English than all other languages together, and it is also the language that is spoken in the most countries. However, Chinese has by far the largest number of native speakers. There seems to be only a weak connection between the number of native speakers a language has and the number of people who learn it, but there is a stronger link between the number of learners and how many countries have speakers.
